proposal: Diving into the rhythm of the EDMC Network, we see you're syncing beats and blockchain on the Polygon stage, supporting artists and fans alike. With just 4 holders on the ETH network, it's time to amplify your reach. Imagine integrating our DEX or launching a community lottery, turning every token into a backstage pass. Let's remix the way your community engages, making every beat drop even more rewarding. 🎶🔧
